content: was knitted in patons baby smiles fairytale fab 4 ply p purl 100% acrylic however some of the yarn shades patt s pattern s originally used have since been discontinued repeat repeat suitable substitute yarns include sirdar snuggly 4 ply and stylecraft special 4 ply both of which rh right hand are 100% acrylic yarns available in a range of rs right side colours ssk slip the next stitch on the left needle - you could alternatively use dk weight yarns knit-wise then slip the next stitch on the double knitting/light worsted weight/8 ply if you left needle purl-wise take the left cannot source the 4 ply yarns however it is needle and knit through the front of the recommended to use the same yarn weight two slipped stitches on the right needle throughout decrease by 1 st s stitch es needles & notions st st stockinette - a pair of 3 25mm us 3 single pointed needles decrease together minimum length 20cm ws wrong side - a 3 5mm us e/4 crochet hook yo yarn-over increase by 1 - a darning or tapestry needle for seaming - a 200g bag of toy filling - two 6mm toy safety eyes per animal - a 6 inch embroidery hoop - bobbins for intarsia colour-work - a ruler or tape measure woodland tales mobile copyright © 2018 amanda berry page 2 of 10 knitting pattern row 22 k4 red k2tog red k4 red ssk white k9 white k2tog white k4 red ssk red k4 red fox body 29 sts make 1 start at the bottom cast on 9 sts in red on row 23 p9 red p11 white p9 red 3 25mm needles row 24 k3 red k2tog red k4 red ssk white row 1 ws purl k7 white k2tog white k4 red ssk red k3 red row 2 rs k1 kfb 8 25 sts times 17 sts row 25 p8 red p9 white p8 red row 3 purl row 26 k2 red k2tog red k4 red ssk white row 4 k1 kfb k1 8 k5 white k2tog white k4 red ssk red k2 red times 25 sts 21 sts row 5 purl row 27 p7 red p7 white p7 red row 6 k1 kfb k2 8 row 28 k1 red k2tog red k4 red ssk white times 33 sts k3 white k2tog white k4 red ssk red k1 red row 7 purl 17 sts row 8 k1 kfb k7 4 times 37 sts row 29 p17 red row 9 purl cast off all sts in red and break the bobbins of white and red yarns break the red working yarn join bobbins of red yarn 2 bobbins and white yarn 1 bobbin to work the tummy using intarsia colour-work fox tail row 10 k17 red k3 white k17 red make 1 start at the base of the tail cast on 8 sts in red on 3 25mm needles row 11 p16 red p5 white p16 red row 1 ws purl row
